result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. MITCHELL T. FOWLER

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:00 AM Defendant MITCHELL T. FOWLER in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Mulligan II in court for MITCHELL T. FOWLER.  Attorney Christian Ness in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances. Court reviews Criminal Complaint. Waive reading, enters NG plea. Court reviews bond. Waive time limits for prelim.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
10:43 AM Defendant MITCHELL T. FOWLER in court, in custody.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Atty Otten appears specially. Public Defender's office has not found counsel for him, but are still actively looking. Atty Otten speaks to the court-defendant requesting bond modification. Defendant makes statement. Bond to continue.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

w/ a $1000.00 signature bond.


No abusive contact w/ A.M dob:9/19/1979
Absolute sobriety. Not to consume/possess any controlled substances unless prescribed.

1:00 PM Defendant MITCHELL T. FOWLER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christian Ness appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Court questions the defendant-currently homeless. Contact phone number #715-557-2798   Defendant makes statement to the court. State requests cash bail. Atty Otten makes argument. Court sets bail.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
1:01 PM Defendant MITCHELL T. FOWLER not in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. No appearance by defendant. Warrant will stand.
Voluntary appearance on May 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:14 AM Defendant MITCHELL T. FOWLER not in court.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. No appearance by defendant. State speaks re: service-mailed on 2/25, returned on 3/8, resent and returned, multiple service attempts. State requests warrant. Granted.
